content:
Stage 1: Plan.

Move 5: Move disk 1 from rod A to rod C.
```less
Rod A: []
Rod B: []
Rod C: [3, 2, 1]
```
Stage 2: Evaluate.

* Value: 1. The move is valid and seems optimal.
* Short Horizon Reward: 1. The state is the goal state, as all the disks are in the correct position on rod C.
* Long Horizon Reward: N/A. There is no need to consider the long horizon reward since the goal state has been reached.
* Revised Value: 1. The move is valid and optimal.

Stage 3: Reflect.

Based on the revised value, I think the previous plan is an optimal one. I have made the move and reached the goal state. Please provide any feedback or confirm the solution.
